pageContext.claim: “The 12th Congressional District [in Pennsylvania], the Democrat running for the seat is a radical socialist. The Democrat candidate wants to open your borders and we're fighting like hell with the worst laws to get those borders closed.”
pageContext.analysis: The Democratic candidate in this race, Marc Friedenberg, "said he wants to expand high-speed internet access, let people buy into the Medicare program and protect Social Security," according to radio station WPSU. These positions are not those of a "radical socialist." Trump falsely claimed Friedenberg was for "open borders." "In some parts of the border it makes sense to have a fence or a wall; some places other technological measures like cameras; other places increased personnel," Friedenberg said during the race.
